attributes.action: tell us when the first ministerial post is to be axed as a result of the global downturn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of our government cannot be maintained at pre-global downturn levels because the amount of tax being taken in has drastically reduced so the number of expensive ministers HAS to be reduced.  Hartlepool Council - a staunch Nu-Labour area which suffers the stigma of having spawned Lord Mandelson - is leading by exampe and has announced that 6 of its top jobs are to go, in a money saving exercise.  So when can we expect to be told when and how many of our government ministers are to go?
